channel.title: Java question
channel.description:
Hello, when i try to run my 317 client, i get a big error, and it wont run? i have a computer with Windows 7 (64 bit) i know that i have jdk, i know my classpaths are set correctally, because i can compile with no errors, and host servers
i tried to run it in compatability mode, run as admin, windows 7 converter (from .bat to .exe)
No luck so far.
my run.bat code is as follows:
[code=javascript]@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
the error i get when try to run is as follows: [code=java]@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]

item.title: Java question
item.dc:creator: @Darkomania Darkomania
item.description:
@Darkomania wrote:

[quote=“Pina Coladas, post:1, topic:367514”]Hello,
when i try to run my 317 client, i get a big error, and it wont run?
i have a computer with Windows 7 (64 bit)
i know that i have jdk, i know my classpaths are set correctally, because i can compile with no errors, and host servers[/quote]

What error? if its hs_err_pid### change java for “c:\program files~~ (x86)~~\java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java*exe”

~~ = you change…
